txt.en: 'The guards report they are seeing more hunting packs, like the one you killed, coming from Fang Point than we've ever seen before. A pack that size is likely to have a few den-mothers, busy raising more Wargs.\n\n'It is important that you defeat a Warg den-mother.'
'You managed to kill a Warg den-mother and her pack? That was likely one nasty Warg! Well done, [placeholder].'
The Warg pack at Fang Point is dangerous; its pack terrorizes the surrounding roadways, and have begun attacking guards at Feldburg.
Defeat a den-mother at Fang Point
Fang Point is a Warg den in the planes south of Feldburg.\n\nYou should defeat a den-mother at Fang Point to stop the spread of Wargs.
Return to Captain Agelmund in Feldburg
Captain Agelmund can be found at his station in Feldburg.\n\nYou should speak with Captain Agelmund.
